extendedInfo.description: Comodo Battery Saver makes your phone/tablet battery last a whole lot longer and slashes how often you need to put it on charge. Through it's intelligent optimization feature, energy saving tweaks are automatically applied as your battery moves towards exhaustion. The application lets you quickly switch between power saving modes and to disable power-hungry applications with a single tap. Comodo Battery Saver also generates alerts when, for example, the battery needs to be unplugged from charge and gives you a detailed breakdown of exactly which applications are using the most power. Features:* Intelligent Save - Automatically switches from normal mode to economy modes when the battery power reaches low levels* Power Profiles â Easily create custom profiles that suit the precise needs of your device usage patterns* Advanced Battery Notifications  -  Reminds you when your battery has reached full charge and should be disconnected from the power supply* Quick Actions â Enable or disable features with a single touch to quickly extend the life of your battery* Utilization Stats-  At-a-glance statistics tell you which apps and features are drawing the most power

reviews.title: Best battery saver
reviews.comment: I compared many battery saver and it\'s the best app ever. Intelligent saving is so smart that I expect from this software and very customizable based on your needs. Highly recommended, and thank you for the developer.
reviews.author: Riki Risnandar

reviews.title: Bug?
reviews.comment: There\'s a problem at the charge page. When I touches the battery meter it pop\'s out a list for me to select... After selection my later Comodo says battery neandethral and keep giving error while charging but I am not charging at all... What is this? Please fix. Other than that are all good.
reviews.author: Ben Fy

reviews.title: The best ever!
reviews.comment: I tried other high rated battery saver apps but none comes closer to this... It not only saves battery juice but it also has lots of functional options.  Best of all it consumes lesser memory and power than others.   Truly this is amazing.   Kudos to the developer!
reviews.author: ED LINESES

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Have tried many battery savers and this one really works. I usually have to recharge once a day because im a power user but since installing this app it is no longer needed. Your products are one of the best out there.
reviews.author: Shane Allara

reviews.title: Great work but lack something
reviews.comment: I often appreciate Comodo\'s very customizable software like its firewall. However CBS lack something to given 5 stars for the moment... Under \"Intelligent Options\", aside from  Save mode switch, it is supposed to have a check box option under it to shutdown the system if it reaches x% critical battery level to help extend battery life and a check box option to sound an audible beep, warning the user for the critical battery level . Overall still the best battery saver in my simple opinion.
reviews.author: Jehoven Guilot

reviews.title: We shall see...
reviews.comment: Just installed so waiting for results and will re-rate soon. Also experiencing the problem that it tells me what I did wrong about charging when I did not do those things. A widget to quickly switch between modes would come in handy too.
reviews.author: Petr Kol\303\241\305\231

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: I used Snapdragon Battery Guru. before but ever-since i change my vm heapsize to 48m it always force closes.... so then ive seen this app! great SUPERB app! protects your battery while charging and it has profiles that allows you to use it while charging! worry free! i noticed an auto \"data-pause\" function too. it was all functional!  and i also noticed it somehow turns on deep sleep mode for rooted users? :D anyway... great work! KEEP IT THIS WAY AND FREE! AND LESS ADS! THANKYOU :*
reviews.author: JP Garmay

reviews.title: best
reviews.comment: isse pehle me easy battery saver use kr rha tha pr ab to kisi or battery saver ka sawal hi nhi uthta u did great job keep it up..thanks
reviews.author: vinod nagda

reviews.title: Love it, however
reviews.comment: It has definatly helped keep my battery useage im check, love the features amd really easy to use, however its obsessed with putting my phone on silent. No matter how many times I manually go enable ringtone, itll randomly do it. I have missed 4 extremly important phone calls, which makes me put 4 stars for that.  So Im forced to uninstall, I will redownload if this ever gets fixed.
reviews.author: Lindsey Partridge

reviews.title: A better battey saver .....den any out der
reviews.comment: i loved the battery saver ......all the way simplistic ....but would love a feature call charging profile that would switch profile on charging avoid from overheating
reviews.author: Irene Fernandes

reviews.title: Best battery saver
reviews.comment: This is the best I\'ve used,  way better than Juice Defender! Don\'t waste your time or money on anything else!
reviews.author: Ryan Tearney

reviews.title: Outstanding app
reviews.comment: 18 hours of use and still have 59% charge left !
reviews.author: Dean Michaud

reviews.title: HTC one x plus
reviews.comment: Works really well. Before I used to lose about 12% of my battery when in sleep mode for 8 hours. Now I\'m just losing 2%. Amazing app

reviews.title: Its ok but not too good
reviews.comment: I actually have the same amount of battery when i dont use this but sometimes this does help

reviews.comment: Best free battery saver I have used so far. Simple and effective. Btw I only use it to auto cut off network during night hours and when battery is low

reviews.comment: Easiest battery saver to control w/o to many controls & good loadin times too :P

reviews.title: Simple better than the rest!
reviews.comment: Awesome product by Comodo. I gained at least another 24 hours with this app. Twice better than other popular free and paid battery saver apps I\'ve tried.
